basics.name: Yang Hou
basics.summary: An undergraduate student in Peking University who works on nonequilibrium many-body physics.

publications.name: Floquet-engineered emergent massive Nambu-Goldstone modes
publications.summary: Engineer symmetries, relize and manipulate emergent Nambu-Goldstone modes in non-equilibrium systems.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
